channel.title: Run server
channel.description: hi, i get this error when i run server (blitzpk) all i done was add a few npcs, a few shops and some npc speak, here it is: [code]---BlitzScape by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]

item.title: Run server
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Probably in your shop.cfg or autospawn.cfg, you used 9spacespace instead of 9tab

Read full topic

item.description:
